DOC.brief_summary: This study compare outcome four commonly use operation repair primary groin hernia include new key hole surgical technique . It aim answer question whether new technology really improve outcome , save time reduce patient suffering .
DOC.brief_title: Hernia Repair Four Arm Comparative Study
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare two traditional technique inguinal hernia repair ; namely Lechtenstien repair properitoneal repair versus two technique laparoscopic hernia repair , namely extraperitoneal transperitoneal repair . It compare operative time , complication , postoperative pain speed patient recovery .
DOC.criteria: adult male primary inguinal hernia recurrent hernia previous low abdominal surgery [ exclude appendectomy ]
